articles.author: Kaye Wiggins
articles.title: China is becoming more trouble than it's worth for US investment banks - Financial Times
articles.description: Selling shares in Chinese companies offshore used to be a money-spinner — but that’s no longer the case
articles.content:
When one of Chinas biggest property developers wanted to raise $300mn in Hong Kong late last month, JPMorgan Chase seemed to have everything ready. 
The Wall Street bank had lined up investors for t… [+4219 chars]
